name: Dinosaurs A Prehistoric Adventure
description: Be the dinosaur! Experience the world of dinosaurs like never before! Dinosaurs A Prehistoric Adventure is an ARPG where you could play as 15 dinosaurs in a semi-open world environment.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Later Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.6 GHz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 720 or Equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Later Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 3 GHz or faster Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 or Equivalent Storage: 5 GB available space
